feed.title: MUnit Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest MUnit news and events.

entry.title: MUnit is a new Scala testing library
entry.summary: Hello world! I'm excited to announce the first release of MUnit, a new Scala testing library with a focus on actionable errors and extensible APIs. You may be thinking "Why create Yet Another Scala testing library?". It's a good question and this post is my attempt to explain the motivations for creating MUnit.
